source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_00<tab>Arenvald wishes to put your considerable reputation to good use.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_00<tab>アラミガン・クォーターの偽神獣対策部隊の闘士は、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_01<tab>The blasphemy hunter informs you that Arenvald's preparations for the memorial ceremony proceed apace. You have been called to assist in the delivery of invitations to an explanatory meeting, despite you being somewhat overqualified for such an endeavor.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_01<tab>ラウバーンからの伝言を聞いた。アレンヴァルドを中心に、慰霊祭の説明会の準備を進めているようだ。アラミガン・クォーターで「アレンヴァルド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_02<tab>Arenvald has delivered most of the aforementioned invitations, leaving only M'rahz Nunh and Sarisha, leaders of communities located in the Fringes with whom you are acquainted. Although there is a strong chance they will refuse to attend a ceremony that involves mourning the deaths of Ala Mhigans branded traitors, Arenvald believes your presence might tip the scales. In addition to the basic details of the invitations themselves, he has also provided a brief but heartfelt treatise. Even should his offer be declined, the invitees will at least comprehend his reasons for hosting the event.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_02<tab>アレンヴァルドから、慰霊祭の説明会への案内状を届ける手伝いを頼まれた。ギラバニア辺境地帯で、ピーリング・ストーンズのメ・ラツ・ヌンと、ウィルラ・ニリヤのサリーシャに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90A201 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_03<tab>M'rahz Nunh and Sarisha both have serious reservations regarding the ceremony, and initially had their minds set on refusing the invitation. However, upon reading Arenvald's letter, they reconsider the proposal, and finally agree to attend. In addition, each states their eagerness to meet the author of the letter, which appears to have had a profound effect on them.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_03<tab>メ・ラツ・ヌンとサリーシャに案内状を渡した。案内状には、アレンヴァルドが対話により知り得た、遺族たちの過去が書かれていたようだ。家族のために行動していた遺族の話に、メ・ラツ・ヌンは理解を示し、立場や境遇の違いにより生まれた悲劇を繰り返さぬようにと、サリーシャも慰霊祭の開催に理解を示した。アラミガン・クォーターに戻り、「アレンヴァルド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_04<tab>Arenvald is delighted to hear that you have succeeded in persuading the two village leaders to join the explanatory meeting. With most of the preparations in order, he asks that you go on ahead to the Royal Palace and wait for the other guests to arrive.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_04<tab>アレンヴァルドと話した。慰霊祭の説明会に参加するため、アラミガン・クォーターで「解放軍の案内人」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_05<tab>Now that delegates from each of the Ala Mhigan communities have arrived in the Royal Palace, Raganfrid opens the proceedings. Several guests are quick to voice their objections to the memorial ceremony, and for a few moments, it seems that the differences of opinion may be irreconcilable after all. Raubahn cuts through the din of bickering voices to state his intent, which goes some way to easing the tension in the room, though a few remain unconvinced. It is then that Arenvald takes the floor, delivering an impassioned speech which seems to have won over the naysayers. The discussion then turns from the “why” of the ceremony to the “how” as they set about deciding the finer details of the event.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_05<tab>慰霊祭の説明会に参加した。代表者たちの中には反対するものもいたが、ラウバーンやアレンヴァルドの真摯な言葉に耳を傾けていた。アラミガン・クォーターで「ラウバーン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_06<tab>Raubahn is heartened by the outcome of the meeting, and is cautiously optimistic that Arenvald will make a success of the memorial ceremony. He also explains that Fordola's presence has been requested in Ala Gannha, where she is to meet the girl she had previously saved, and the child's mother.

※The next role quest will be available from the blasphemy hunter upon reaching level 89 in any healer class.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SEQ_06<tab>ラウバーンと話した。今すぐとはいかずとも、慰霊祭は開催に向けて動きだすことができそうだ。残る偽神獣の討伐に向けて、力を蓄えておこう。

※いずれかのHEALERジョブのレベルが89以上になると、アラミガン・クォーターの偽神獣対策部隊の闘士から次のHEALERロールクエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Arenvald.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_00<tab>アレンヴァルドと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_01<tab>Deliver an invitation to M'rahz Nunh in the Peering Stones.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_01<tab>ピーリング・ストーンズのメ・ラツ・ヌンに
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90A201 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_02<tab>Deliver an invitation to Sarisha in Vira Nilya.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_02<tab>ウィルラ・ニリヤのサリーシャに
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90A201 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Arenvald in the Ala Mhigan Quarter.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_03<tab>アラミガン・クォーターのアレンヴァルドと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the Royal Palace guard.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_04<tab>解放軍の案内人と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Raubahn.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TODO_05<tab>ラウバーンと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_000<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Commander Aldynn has asked me to convey to you the following information.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_000<tab>あっ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
ラウバーン隊長より、伝言を授かっております！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_001<tab>At present, we are looking into reports of missing relatives of the Crania Lupi. With the cooperation of the Silver Griffins, we're currently searching for any clues as to their whereabouts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_001<tab>まずは、現状のご報告です！
解放軍は「白羽根の会」と協力し、髑髏連隊の遺族の中でも、
行方不明者に絞って偽神獣の手がかりを探っています！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_002<tab>Thanks to the concerted efforts of Raganfrid and the others, the general public has been willing to cooperate with our investigation. Though many still harbor feelings of distrust for the collaborators and their kin, they've grown more receptive to our cause on the whole.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_002<tab>ラウバーン隊長の陣頭指揮によって、
少しずつではありますが、調査は着実に進行中。
調査に協力してくれる民間人も増えているのであります！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_003<tab>Arenvald's been making steady progress in preparing for the memorial ceremony. He plans to host a meeting between the various community leaders to go over the finer details.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_003<tab>一方、「慰霊祭」の開催に向けた準備は、
発起人であるアレンヴァルドさんを中心に進められております！
近く、各代表への説明会が開催される予定だとか……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_004<tab>In fact, he was wondering whether you could assist in delivering the invitations. If you can spare the time, you should be able to find him in the mercantile district.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_004<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんには、ぜひ説明会に向けて動いている、
アレンヴァルドさんのサポートに回っていただきたいとのこと！
ここから南西の市街地にいらっしゃるので、向かってください！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_005<tab>Anyway, that's all for now. I've a few other matters to attend to, so if you'll excuse me, duty calls!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_005<tab>伝言は以上になります！
では、私も別件の任務がありますので、失礼いたします！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_010<tab>Thanks for coming. It should come as no surprise that planning a memorial ceremony for a whole bloody nation would keep a man busy, but by Rhalgr, this is something else!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_010<tab>来てくれてありがとうな。
慰霊祭のことは、すでに聞いているだろうが、
一応、改めて趣旨を説明させてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_011<tab>The hardest part's been gathering information on those who died in the war, especially when it comes to the Skulls and other conscripts. And they're the ones we need to treat most carefully.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_011<tab>慰霊祭は、亡くなった人たちを弔う場だが、
そこに髑髏連隊の遺族たちも招待したいんだ。
家族が罪を犯したとはいえ、愛する者への想いは同じだからな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_100_012<tab>If we don't acknowledge the crimes of our kin in all their painful truth, then we do a disservice to their victims living and dead. But if we let people paint them as monsters who did monstrous things─things we believe we would never do─then we perpetuate a different but no less dangerous lie.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_100_012<tab>問題は、代表者たちの同意を得られるかどうかだ。
髑髏連隊は、多くのアラミゴ人にとって忌まわしい記憶……
それは俺も理解しているさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_012<tab>As for preparing the event itself, I'll be holding a meeting with members from each of the settlements around Gyr Abania. I've sent invitations to most of them already, but I was hoping you'd help me with the last two.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_012<tab>だからこそ、きちんと説明の場を設けようと思うんだ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>には、その説明会への案内状を、
ギラバニア辺境地帯の代表者に届けてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_013<tab>There's M'rahz Nunh in the Peering Stones and Sarisha in Vira Nilya. I'll give you one for each.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_013<tab>この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90A201 /var>」を、
ピーリング・ストーンズの「メ・ラツ・ヌン」さんと、
ウィルラ・ニリヤの「サリーシャ」さんに渡してほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_014<tab>To be honest, I wouldn't be surprised if they refused, considering how their people suffered at the hands of the Skulls. But I hope we can remind them that deep down, we're all just people trying to survive, to protect our loved ones.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_014<tab>髑髏連隊の被害を受けた人たちからすれば、
慰霊祭といっても、その心中は複雑なはずだ……。
最悪、説明会への参加すら、断られかねないと思う。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_015<tab>We may have driven the Empire from our lands, but as long as we hold fast to the grudges born of their attempts to divide and set us against one another, we'll never be free of their legacy of cruelty.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_015<tab>でも、髑髏連隊の遺族たちだって、同じ「人」なんだよ。
罪を憎むことと、遺族を孤立させて絶望に追いやることは、
別のことだと知ってほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_016<tab>With that in mind, I've included an account of my experiences with the Silver Griffins and the people I've met. Victims, collaborators, their friends and their family─men and women who lived through it all. Survivors.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_016<tab>そこで、案内状には開催の趣旨と共に、
俺が「白羽根の会」で出会ってきた、
髑髏連隊の遺族たちの境遇を書き記しておいたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_017<tab>Even if they refuse to join the ceremony, at least they will know─and hopefully understand─our reasons for holding the event.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_017<tab>彼らにも愛する家族や大事な人がいることや、
帝国の侵略で同じように苦しんでいたことなんかを、
少しでも知ってほしくてさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_018<tab>Granted, I've not had much practice in writing important letters, but I think they'll get the message. You being the one to deliver them will make a world of difference, I'm sure. Take care, won't you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_018<tab>拙い文章ではあるけれど、
それで少しでも理解してもらえれば幸いだ。
配達士みたいなことさせてすまないが、よろしく頼むよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_019<tab>If M'rahz Nunh and Sarisha end up refusing the invitation, it'll be no fault of yours. At the very least, you'll have a chance to hear their thoughts on the matter.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_019<tab>すまないが、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90A201 /var>」を、
ピーリング・ストーンズの「メ・ラツ・ヌン」さんと、
ウィルラ・ニリヤの「サリーシャ」さんに渡してきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MHAHTOA_100_019<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What a rare treat this is. Had I known you were coming, I would've prepared a feast!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MHAHTOA_100_019<tab>あら、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
このような所まで、ようこそいらしてくださいました。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_020<tab>Greetings, friend. It has been too long since last we spoke. What brings you to my village?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_020<tab>おお、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃないか。
私に何か用か？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_021<tab>So the rumors are true... I need not read this letter in full to know its contents.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_021<tab>慰霊祭……か。
たしかに、その話は噂に聞いている。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_022<tab>I understand that Raganfrid's volunteers are working to support the families of those lost in the war, which few will deny is a worthy cause. But to include the relatives of the Crania Lupi?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_022<tab>どういう風の吹き回しかわからぬが……
あのラガンフリッドが、遺族への支援組織を立ち上げたのだろう？
それも、髑髏連隊の遺族を、支援対象に含めていると聞く……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_023<tab>The Skulls watched the Empire slay us in our thousands and <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> they turned their cloaks and fought for our oppressors. And you would ask us to mourn the deaths of these curs alongside their victims?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_023<tab>正直なところ、メ族には帝国に恨みを持っている者も多い。
この私とて、戦争で死んでいった仲間がいる手前、
おいそれと容認するわけにはいかぬのだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A1_000_001<tab>I ask only that you read the rest of the letter.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A1_000_001<tab>そう言わず、まずは案内状を読んでほしい

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A1_000_002<tab>You have every right to be angry and to refuse. Arenvald wishes only that you read his account before coming to a decision.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A1_000_002<tab>開催の趣旨を読んでから決めてほしい

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_024<tab>...To dismiss it out of hand would be discourteous. Very well.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_024<tab>たしかに頭から否定するのは不躾だったが……
いいだろう、お前がそこまで言うのなら、案内状を読ませてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_025<tab>...Family.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_025<tab>…………家族か。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_026<tab>As nunh, my tribe <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> my family, and I know all too well the responsibility that brings. I would do anything to protect them. <var 1A 02 /var>Anything<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_026<tab>考えてみれば当然のことだな。
私はメ族の長、家族を守る責任の重さは、誰よりわかるつもりだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_027<tab>Loyalty, pride...conscience. My very soul. All are meaningless if I cannot ensure the safety of those I love. I suspected some Skulls had been faced with the selfsame choice, but to see how their kin suffered, I...I cannot say I do not understand. Though I wish that I did not.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_027<tab>子を、親を守るためなら、売国奴と呼ばれることもいとわない。
その悲壮な覚悟が、誤った道を歩ませるに至ったと、
そんな風に、考えられもするか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_028<tab>Their crimes will <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> be forgiven. They cannot be. But I, and any others who are willing, can offer our prayers for these tortured souls and the men they could have been.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_028<tab>……わかった、犯した非道は許すことはできぬが、
私とて遺族たちを絶望に追いやることは本意でない……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_029<tab>I accept the invitation. Not on behalf of the M tribe, but as M'rahz Nunh─though I will put the question to my people that they may decide for themselves.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_029<tab>メ族は、慰霊祭への参加を約束する！
もちろん、説明会へも足を運ぶとしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_030<tab>I am also eager to make the acquaintance of the person who wrote this letter. He is not wont to turn a blind eye to the bitter truth─painful though it is to confront. The meeting will be the perfect opportunity to take his measure.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_030<tab>どうか、案内状を書いた若者にも、感謝の言葉を伝えてほしい。
我々アラミゴ人が長いこと目を背けてきた問題へと、
真摯に向き合ってくれた勇気に、私は敬意を表すよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_031<tab>I will convey your friend's intent to the rest of the tribe before attending the memorial ceremony. Those who cannot support it will not interfere. You have my word.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_031<tab>メ族の者たちには、私から説得しよう。
こんなときにまで我々アラミゴ人を気にかけてくれて、感謝するよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MHAHTOA_000_032<tab>With all the recent trouble, the towns and villages we once thought safe are fraught with danger. Please, keep your senses keen wherever you go.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MHAHTOA_000_032<tab>各地で異形の獣が現れていると聞きました。
どうかあなたも、決して無理はしないでくださいね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_040<tab>Welcome. To what do we owe the pleasure of your visit?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_040<tab>シュー……そなたが会いに来てくれようとは。
我々に何か用があってのことですか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_041<tab>Then it is as I sssuspected...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_041<tab>シュー……なるほど、話はわかりました。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_042<tab>There have been rumors that sssuch a ceremony would take place. Although you have traveled far to make this invitation, I must decline. We cannot mourn the loss of the fallen if the Crania Lupi are to be counted among them.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_042<tab>しかし、たとえほかならぬそなたの頼み事であっても、
慰霊祭に髑髏連隊の戦死者を含めることは、賛同しかねます。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_043<tab>Like the Qalyana, they chose to aid the Garlean oppresssors, killing and bleeding for those who would pillage our lands. Cowards and traitors all.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_043<tab>彼らはカリヤナ派のように、
帝国に抗うこともせず、楽な生活へ逃げるかのように、
故郷を捨て、同胞を裏切り、敵国に寝返ったと聞いています。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_044<tab>And are we to asssume that Qalyana who died fighting for the Empire will be honored as well? If so, that is all the more reason for usss to refuse.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_044<tab>そなたらのおかげで戦争が終結したとはいえ、
カリヤナ派と対立している我々が、認めることは難しいでしょう。
力になることができず、心苦しいですが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A2_000_001<tab>That is your right, and no one will say otherwise. I come only to present a letter and ask that you read it in full.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A2_000_001<tab>開催の趣旨を読めば気持ちは変わるかも

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A2_000_002<tab>Arenvald understands and accepts that you might refuse. His only request was that you read his account and then decide.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_A2_000_002<tab>案内状には髑髏連隊の遺族のことも書かれている

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_045<tab>If you insssist...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_045<tab>シュー……わかりました。
それでは、まずは案内状を拝読いたしましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_046<tab>...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_046<tab>………………。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_100_046<tab>No one was spared suffering in the occupation. Not the Resistance, not the collaborators, not the families of both─no one.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_100_046<tab>シュー……。
我らは自由を得るために、多くの犠牲を払ってきました。
同胞たちの痛みや苦しみを、蔑ろにするわけにはいきません。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_110_046<tab>That so many would die in shame and ignominy, having sssold their sssouls only to lose everything...is a tragedy. And a lesson.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_110_046<tab>ですが……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_047<tab>If they are forgotten, then the lessson of their folly is forgotten. For the sssake of this land we call home, I will join you in remembrance, and implore my people to do the same.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_047<tab>……いいでしょう。
我らウィルラ派のアナンタ族は、慰霊祭に賛同します。
戦争による悲劇が、二度と生まれないことを願って……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_048<tab>In mourning may we strengthen our ties with our neighbors as well. By together facing our past we can build a foundation for lasting peace and prosssperity.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_048<tab>こうして足を運び、言葉を交わしてくれたことを嬉しく思います。
ヒトは知らないこと、わからないことに恐怖を抱きます。
どちらかが歩み寄らない限り、相互理解は生まれません。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_049<tab>It would be my honor to attend the proposed meeting, and I look forward to persssonally thanking your friend Arenvald for his dedication. I and my peers have much to learn from the example he has set.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_049<tab>慰霊祭の説明会には、ウィルラ派代表として私が赴きましょう。
「アレンヴァルド」という、そなたの友にも感謝を伝えてください。
この方は真摯にアラミゴのことを考えてくれているようです。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_050<tab>Would I be correct in guessing your friend does not often ssscribe such letters? I could not help but notice he had foregone the usual platitudes and fanciful phrasing. His directnesss was most refreshing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SARISHA_000_050<tab>慰霊祭の説明会には、ウィルラ派代表として私が赴きましょう。
「アレンヴァルド」という、そなたの友にも感謝を伝えてください。
この方は真摯にアラミゴのことを考えてくれているようです。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_051<tab>So, how did you fare in the Fringes?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_051<tab>おかえり、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
辺境地帯の代表者たちの反応はどうだったかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_052<tab>They said that about <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!? It's rare for me to get such glowing praise, especially from renowned leaders like Sarisha and M'rahz Nunh!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_052<tab>メ族とウィルラ派の代表が俺に感謝を！？
身に余る光栄だよ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_053<tab>More importantly, though, they agreed to attend the meeting, and I've got you to thank for that. After all, I imagine it's hard to turn down an invitation when it's hand-delivered by the Warrior of Light <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_053<tab>ともかく、ふたりが慰霊祭に賛成してくれて良かった。
これも信頼の厚い<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>のおかげさ。
協力してくれて本当にありがとう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_054<tab>Before I get ahead of myself, though, I must remember that this is only the beginning. Bringing everyone together is one thing. Coming to an agreement on an extremely divisive issue is a different kettle of fish entirely, as Her Grace was quick to point out.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_054<tab>素性をよく知らない人たちに対して警戒してしまうのは仕方ない。
それでも、人となりを知れば共感できる部分だってあるはずなんだ。
対話を諦めてはいけない……俺はナナモ様にそれを教わった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_055<tab>But as she's taught me, if our cause is just and our hearts are true, those of like mind will surely answer the call.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_055<tab>……まだ、そんな大層なことはしてないけどさ、
誰かのためにできることがあるなら、俺はやりたい。
たとえそれが地味でも、自分なりの英雄への道を模索するんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_056<tab>And answer it they have. While there are bound to be differences of opinion, I'm sure there's nothing we can't overcome if we put our minds to it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_056<tab>さてと……！
これで慰霊祭の説明会に向けて、代表者たちへの案内は完了した。
当然、反対の人たちもいたが、ひとまずは足を運んでくれそうだよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_057<tab>To that end, I was hoping you could join us, if you've the time to spare. There are still a few loose ends Raganfrid and I need to tie up beforehand, so we'll meet you in the palace as soon as we can. Just having you there will make a world of difference!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_057<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>にも、ぜひ出席してもらいたい。
「解放軍の案内人」には伝えてあるから、声をかけてくれ。
俺もラガンフリッドと合流してすぐに向かうとするよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_058<tab>Once we've got everything in order, Raganfrid and I will meet you in the palace.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_058<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>にも、ぜひ出席してもらいたい。
「解放軍の案内人」には伝えてあるから、声をかけてくれ。
俺もラガンフリッドと合流してすぐに向かうとするよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_GUARDS04111_000_060<tab>Here for the meeting, yes?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_GUARDS04111_000_060<tab>代表者による「慰霊祭」の説明会が開かれております。
会場へ向かわれますか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Enter the Royal Palace?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>「アラミゴ王宮」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAGANFRID_000_080<tab>...So while we all agree upon the importance of the ceremony, we recognize that the inclusion of the Crania Lupi will be distressing for many. I too lost family at their hands, and I would never ask others to forgive and forget.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAGANFRID_000_080<tab>慰霊祭を開催するにあたって、
髑髏連隊の関係者を呼ぶことに、異論があるのは承知している。
私とて家族を殺された身……その気持ちは痛いほどわかる。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAGANFRID_000_081<tab>But for all their crimes, they were Ala Mhigans, just like us. None made the decision to side with Garlemald lightly.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAGANFRID_000_081<tab>しかし、もとをただせば、彼らも私たちと同じアラミゴ人。
この非常事態だからこそ共に……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TIBOST_000_082<tab>They had a choice, and they <var 1A 02 /var>chose<var 1A 01 /var> to betray us!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_TIBOST_000_082<tab>髑髏連隊は……奴らは同胞を殺しているんだぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_083<tab>Who among us have not made difficult choices for kith and kin? And do not forget that Fordola chose to stand between us and a primal.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_MRAHZNUNH_000_083<tab>だが、以前ここで我らが、
あのフォルドラに命を救われたことも確かだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_STARKWOAD_000_084<tab>What does that have to do with it!?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_STARKWOAD_000_084<tab>しかし、それとこれとは……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_085<tab>Brothers and sisters. Arguing will avail us naught.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_085<tab>しばし、吾輩の言葉に耳を傾けてくれないだろうか。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_086<tab>The fate of Ala Mhigo rests on my shoulders and yours. On those of every man, woman, and child that calls these lands home.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_086<tab>吾輩には、このアラミゴを守るという、大きな責任がある。
そして誰しもが社会に生きる上で、大なり小なり、
何かしらの責を負って生きているはずだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_087<tab>To uphold our honor. To strive for prosperity. To protect our loved ones. We all know the weight of these responsibilities. 'Twas that selfsame weight which drove many of our people to serve our oppressors, misguided as it was.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_087<tab>家族を守る責任、誇りを守る責任……
ここに居るあなた方なら特に、その重みがわかるだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_088<tab>And though they chose a different, unconscionable path, in the end, we all wanted the same thing. To deliver our families from persecution, that they might live to see one more day. Because another day in shame and self-hatred was still better than none at all.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_088<tab>それは、帝国側に付いた者たちも同じだったはず。
我らに不幸があったとすれば、他国に侵されたときに、
それぞれが異なる方法で、大切なものを守ろうとしたことだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_089<tab>The regretful dead are survived by their despair─a despair which threatens to drag us all into an abyss from where there is no escape. Know that it surely will if we welcome it into our hearts out of disdain for those we cannot forgive.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_089<tab>耐え忍ぶことを選んだ者、戦い抗うことを選んだ者、
そして、征服者に膝を突くことを選んだ者……。
皆、守りたかっただけなのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_090<tab>But we Ala Mhigans will not be so easily defeated. We will stand united and conquer this menace!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_090<tab>終末の獣による危機が訪れている今だからこそ、皆で考えてほしい。
今度こそ、苦しいときに団結できる、
助け合えるアラミゴにしようではないか！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_091<tab>Every Ala Mhigan who fought and died did so in the hopes that one day, we would be free.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_091<tab>俺たちはさ、本来平等にあるはずの自由を獲得するために、
多くの血を流して戦い、守られ……そして、生き延びた。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_092<tab>And we are free. We are free. By the blood of our fallen brothers and sisters, we are free.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_092<tab>だから、自由を得た今こそ……犠牲となったすべての命に、
敬意を払うべきだと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_093<tab>Free to lock away the pain and pretend it has no power over us, until it festers and takes us in our beds... And free to lay it bare and let it breathe. To acknowledge and to mourn our people at their best...and their worst.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_093<tab>同じ地で生まれ育ち、ただ自由に憧れたその命に、
違いなんてない……ましてや、今も苦しみ続けている同胞がいる。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_094<tab>The past is ours to bear─all of it. For ourselves, and for future generations, so that they needn't suffer like we did.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_094<tab>あなた方にも辛い過去があるのはわかっているさ。
それを忘れろだなんて、言うつもりはない……。
ただ、このアラミゴを救う、手伝いをさせてもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_095<tab>Let us make Ala Mhigo a nation where no man is left behind. Where he can make all the wrong choices, and still be afforded the chance to make a right one.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_ARENVALD_000_095<tab>そうやって少しずつ、少しずつ……
皆が手を取り合えるアラミゴを、一緒に作っていきたいんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_100<tab>That went better than any of us could've hoped for. You have my gratitude for your part in the proceedings, but we both know who the real hero of the day was.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_100<tab>代表者たちへの案内を手伝ってくれたこと、
吾輩からも礼を言わせてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_101<tab>This was all Arenvald's idea, and it was his words that finally won over the naysayers. Now that we have the community leaders on our side, we should have a much easier time convincing the rest of the citizenry.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_101<tab>それから、アレンヴァルドのおかげで、
「慰霊祭」は開催に向けて動きだすことになるだろう。
まだ納得していない者にも、根気強く対話を試みるそうだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_102<tab>Of course, holding the ceremony is by no means our final objective. No matter what we say, some will refuse to attend. It is my hope, however, that it will still serve to provide a measure of closure for us all, and to ease the plight of the vulnerable and ostracized.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_102<tab>今すぐに開催とはいかずとも、
皆が同じ方向を向き、互いを理解するきっかけとなるだろう。
そしてこの一歩こそが、遺族らを照らす希望の光となることを祈る。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_103<tab>Speaking of which... You will recall the incident with Fordola in Ala Gannha. The young girl she saved and her mother wished to thank her personally. Considering what happened last time, though, I have reservations...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_103<tab>実はな……先日、アラガーナで救われた親子が、
恩人に礼をしたいと、フォルドラに面会を求めてきたそうだ。
これもまた、吾輩にはひとつの希望に思える。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_104<tab>It would be a valuable opportunity to present a former Skull in a more positive light. On the other hand, I don't need to tell you how unpredictable she can be─and that's before taking her Echo into consideration. But that's a conversation for another day. Go and get some rest. You've earned it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_RAUBAHN_000_104<tab>国を内から変える動きが、にわかに生じつつあるということだ。
残るは、偽神獣の討伐……。
動きがあればこちらから連絡するので、引き続きよろしく頼むぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_105<tab>We see a lot of important people coming and going around here. Even though I should be used to it by now, I can't help feeling nervous!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA231_04111_LIVERATIONARMY_000_105<tab>代表者の人たちがぞろぞろ集まってきたので、
ちょっと緊張してしまいました！
